TestItem.Stem: Which of the following can be inferred from paragraph 3 about the location of the meteorite impact in Mexico?

Distractor_list.Distractor: The location of the impact site in Mexico was kept secret by geologists from 1980 to 1990.
It was a well-known fact that the impact had occurred in the Yucat�n region.
Geologists knew that there had been an impact before they knew where it had occurred.
The Yucat�n region was chosen by geologists as the most probable impact site because of its climate.
